Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client.impl

Class DefaultCMCClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client.impl.AbstractCMCClient
      • se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.client.impl.DefaultCMCClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CMCClient
    public class DefaultCMCClient
extends AbstractCMCClient
    Implements the CMC Client used to execute CA management operations via CMC on a remote CA
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultCMCClient

        public DefaultCMCClient​(String cmcRequestUrl,
                        se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential cmcClientCredential,
                        String algorithm,
                        X509Certificate cmcResponseCert,
                        X509Certificate caCertificate)
                 throws MalformedURLException,
                        NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException,
                        CertificateEncodingException
        Constructor for the CMC Client
        Parameters:
        cmcRequestUrl - URL where CMC requests are sent to the remote CA
        cmcClientCredential - the private key and certificate for the CMC client
        algorithm - CMC signing algorithm
        cmcResponseCert - signing certificate of the remote CA CMC responder
        caCertificate - CA certificate used by the remote CA to issue certificates
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - malformed URL
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - algorithm is not supported or recognized
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - error setting up CMC client
        CertificateEncodingException - error parsing provided certificates

    • Method Detail

      • getStaticCAInformation

        public StaticCAInformation getStaticCAInformation()
                                           throws CMCException
        Description copied from interface: CMCClient
        Obtain static information about the remote CA. This only include static non changing information about the CA and does not include dynamic changing information such as certificate count.
        Returns:
        static CA information about the remote CA
        Throws:
        CMCException - on error processing the request
